attributes.review: I just tried to support my president a little more by downloading this app but IT IS A SCAMMMMMMM!!!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! It also took at LEAST 5 days to download! (I stopped counting after the 3rd day). But it’s just terrible overall.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!

attributes.userName: NO I WILL NOT PUT MY NAME
attributes.review: i am very upset and disappointed. 🤮how can u make this app a priority?!😡JUSTICE FOR ALL APPS!😠ALL APPS MATTER! i can’t even open the app. 🙄where is the key to open it? 👿and the colour is very racist.💩 why is it only white blue and red? 🤡what abt yellow, red and green? 🤧ALL COLOURS MATTER!🤦🏻‍♀️😔🤬

attributes.review: Thank y’all for the birthday dinner I was just thinking abt ya girl eye tho haha is a great long was a great long day I wanna know that I love y’all so so cute and I hope you have had fun and I hope y’all had fun and I love y’all so much.

attributes.review: I was super excited to get this app, then while I was waiting for it to load i went into instagram AND SOMEONE HACKED ME!! SOMEONE WAS POSTING RANDOM THING LIKE, “TRUMP 2020” and “I LOVE TRUMP” SO DONT GET THE APP IF YOU WANNA GET HACKED, it also took a longggggggggg time to download 😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔 Just because of that I hate youuuuuuuuuu POOPY TRUMP
attributes.title: the app is poopoo

attributes.review: the app took 39 weeks to download and when i did open the app it scared me i saw an orangish looking man and a threat popped up stating that if i didn’t turn straight and stop supporting blm my rabbits would be kidnapped 😔
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: App keeps crashing whenever I go into it and it literally took a week to download. During that week I was able to get my priorities straight. That being said... BIDEN 2020
attributes.title: Worst App EVER

attributes.review: This app killed my whole family. Because of this I am now homeless and can’t get a job. Do not get this app if you love your family!!!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review:
This app stole all my data and sold it to foreign countries in the Middle East and China. I was placed in witness protection for my safety. As part of safety precautions I will have to vote blue 2020 instead of for this not racist, not misogynistic and not child molesting man. 

Please, for my safety and to keep my indenting safe, VOTE BLUE THIS ELECTION.
attributes.title: SCAM
